content:
We have an open source FHIR Server and an interest in PDEX PlanNet but have not, as yet, been involved in the project.
I'd like to try my hand at packaging the implementation guide and making a server available for the connectathon.
I found the kickoff/orientation deck from https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-05+DaVinci+PDex+Plan-Net# ...was it also recorded? Who else is participating in this track?

For the connectathon we continue to work with the ballotted IG (not the CI Build).
Your list appears of extensions appears complete.
I think there are also some VhDir valuesets/codesystems that get dragged in.

Re recording of the kickoff/orientation deck, I don't know. I'm happy to answer specific questions (and will try to do a better job of monitoring this channel! You can always ping me directly (saul@mitre.org). We appreciate your input/participation.

There is a server (HAPI-FHIR) with the IG resources and sample data loaded available for use.
Did you see the documentation on that?

Thanks Saul. I definitely don't expect immediate support on this thread (and especially not before the event even begins). I did see that there is a reference server for folks to use and I guess I'm mostly interested in testing our server's ability to add support for a new implementation guide and so hopefully there is room for another server to participate.
Thanks for pointing out the valueset references...will address that in the other topic.
